title: Yan Ivanin
text:
Yan Yuryevich Ivanin (; born 4 March 1989) is a Russian former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>.
Club career.
He played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Zvezda%20Irkutsk">FC Zvezda Irkutsk</a> in 2008.
